text: Michel Zecler, a well-known French rap producer, became the focus of an uproar in France over police brutality after video of officers assaulting him was shared online. "What amazes me is that they felt confident enough to go that far," he told @onishinyt. https://t.co/VUHp2jDxhf

text: RT @shearm: BREAKING -- Judge rules that the Trump administration must fully restore DACA by Monday, dealing what could be a final blow to Mr. Trump’s long-fought effort to end the protections from an Obama-era program for undocumented immigrants. w / @itscaitlinhd https://t.co/hctUtLCvwA

name: nytimes
text: Gov. Gavin Newsom of California announced new stay-at-home restrictions on Thursday to prevent a second wave of coronavirus cases from overwhelming hospitals in the state. Here’s what we know about the order: https://t.co/D6xnVarlF3 https://t.co/tRqyW5YmWH

name: nytimes
text: The new order divides California into five regions, where the strict restrictions will take effect based on the remaining capacity of the area's hospital intensive care units. https://t.co/D6xnVarlF3 https://t.co/daEL0qR9HT

name: nytimes
text: The new restrictions are California’s strongest since the stay-at-home order this March, near the onset of the pandemic. https://t.co/D6xnVarlF3 https://t.co/H58pHuTEHb

name: nytimes
text: Still, differences from California’s spring restrictions remain. This time around, Gov. Gavin Newsom is encouraging residents to find safe outdoor spaces, like beaches, parks and fitness classes. https://t.co/D6xnVarlF3 https://t.co/6H7qNw0yB7

name: nytimes
text: Confused about what will close under California's new regional stay-at-home order? You’re not the only one. Here’s a brief guide: https://t.co/D6xnVarlF3 https://t.co/eX6Y9TgmSV

name: nytimes
text: Read more about the new restrictions in California: https://t.co/D6xnVarlF3

name: nytimes
text: See the restrictions and mask mandates in all 50 states here: https://t.co/ThPg7nWGov
